author: Fextralife
description:
Mortal Shell 2 FIRST LOOK - Sequel to the Dark Fantasy Soulslike
In this video, we're going to be taking a look at Mortal Shell 2, which was announced at Summer Game Fest. We had a lot going on with Nightreign during that period, so I didn't get to cover this game. But if you're not familiar with Mortal, it's a series created and developed by Cold Symmetry, and they surprised and blew us away with what they were able to achieve with such a small team.

Timestamp:
0:00 Mortal Shell 2 Preview
0:45 What is Mortal Shell
3:17 Combat & Weapons
4:07 Shells
5:28 Exploration
7:17 Final Thoughts
